text.section: The Energy and Environment Cabinet may secure such automobile liability insurance as will reasonably protect the interest of employees of the cabinet, particularly those employees driving trucks or heavy equipment in the conduct of official business.
Policies authorized by this section shall be purchased only in accordance with regulations prescribed by the commissioner of insurance and the secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 150, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(3). -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 54.
